visualization_prompt: Generate a bar chart showing gender distribution percentages in Swedish professions using percentage-stacked encoding

title.text: Swedish top 10 professions dominated by women (16-64 years) in 2017

visualization_explanation: The dataset contains two quantitative variables (gender percentages) across 10 categorical professions. Synthetic data extends original statistics with μ=15.7% (σ=6.8) for men and μ=84.3% inverse distribution, maintaining domain-appropriate ranges and perfect complementarity. The stacked bar chart maximizes data-ink ratio by directly encoding proportions through bar segments, while Cairo's principles are applied through: 1) High-contrast colors meeting WCAG standards, 2) Position-aligned percentage labels, 3) Perceptually uniform color boundaries. The added 'Social worker' category demonstrates statistical trend consistency with other care professions (85% women vs 15% men). Tooltip formatting (+.0f% precision) and accessibility descriptors support both quick pattern recognition and detailed analysis.
